snippet: A federal appeals court on Tuesday blocked implementation of an amendment adopted by Oklahoma in Nov. 2010 that would bar state courts from considering Shariah, or Islamic, law in any proceedings.
abstract: Federal appeals court blocks implementation of an 2010 amendment adopted by Oklahoma that would bar state courts from considering Shariah, or Islamic, law in any proceedings.
